headline.main: Philippine Troops Recover Remains of Beheaded German Hostage
headline.print_headline: Philippine Troops Recover Remains of Beheaded German Hostage

lead_paragraph: Before a meeting of the National People’s Congress, Premier Li Keqiang defended the target as realistic and vowed to increase pollution monitoring.
